```{python}
import pandas as pd
import plotly.express as px
from inspect_viz import reactive_df, select, figure_view, table_view, menu_input

df = reactive_df(px.data.iris())
# df = df.query("SELECT * WHERE sepal_length < 5")
df = df.query(
    select("*")
    .where(f"sepal_length < 6")
)
```

```{python}
menu_input(df, column="species")
```

```{python}
fig = px.scatter(df, x="sepal_width", y="sepal_length")
figure_view(df, fig)
```

```{python}
table_view(df)
```
